item.description:
Timelapse of Lorraine Loots Creating a Miniature Painting

Over the last few months we've marveled at the precision of South African artist Lorraine Loots' tiny paintings (previously here and here).

item.title: Spot The GP Rocket - The Fuss
item.description:
Spot The GP Rocket - The Fuss

Hello Gareth Pon When I first discovered the #SpotTheGPRocket hashtag on Instagram I thought that it was a community of Igers rallying behind the hashtag to represent Gauteng. A rocket is hidden within each image posted with this hashtag for the of amusement anyone who follows the hashtag.

item.title: A Reverse Guide to Instagram
item.description:
A Reverse Guide to Instagram

All photographers are copyrighted and used with permission from the photographers. Instagram is the place to be for many photographers. Many tens of millions of photographs are uploaded there everyday. The potential is huge, but not everyone gets to bask in the social accolades that come with tens or hundreds of thousands of followers, millions in some cases.

item.title: The Gareth Pon Interview
item.description:
The Gareth Pon Interview

Words: Genevieve Putter | Photographs: Chisanga Mubanga As a freelance writer, I have a confession to make... my shorthand blows. Ironic as interviewing prolific people is a big part of my schtick.

item.title: Social Media has become a marketing tool - Moneyweb
item.description:
Social Media has become a marketing tool - Moneyweb

Interview with Samsung brand ambassador and South African Instagrammer Gareth Pon about social media as a marketing tool. Morgan Barnard | 4 August 2015 16:58 http://www.moneyweb.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/150804-garethpon.mp3 MORGAN BARNARD: Hello and welcome to Moneyweb's special report podcast. My name is Morgan Barnard.
